function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation rates may lead to increased prevalence of respiratory diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of respiratory diseases and increased sick leave.","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates, implement air purification systems, and enforce regular maintenance of ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, CO2 sensors, ventilation rate monitors.","People":"Occupants of the built environment, especially in densely populated areas.","Owner":"Building owners, facility management, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"High occupant density can contribute to the spread of respiratory diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and higher rates of sick leave.","Mitigation":"Reduce occupant density, implement physical barriers, and enforce strict hygiene and sanitation measures.","Technologies":"Physical barriers, occupancy sensors, touchless fixtures.","People":"Occupants of densely populated areas and office buildings.","Owner":"Employers, building owners, and facility management."}]}
